summary: "The Little Mermaid" is a popular fairy tale by Hans Christian Andersen. It tells the story of a mermaid princess who wants to become human to find true love. She makes a deal to trade her mermaid life for human legs. The story is full of adventure and has been adapted into many different forms of media. Scholars have studied the tale for its themes and unique ending. A famous statue of the mermaid can be found in Copenhagen, Denmark, where the story originated.
title: The Little Mermaid
